vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.37;
son of: Zophah (H6690);
brother of: Suah (H5477), Harnepher (H2774), Shual (H7777B), Beri (H1275), Imrah (H3236), Bezer (H1221H), Hod (H1936), Shamma (H8037H), Shilshah (H8030) and Ithran (H3506H)
§ Beera = "a well"
a man of Asher
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Sofah; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "一口井"
亞設家族的一員 (代上7:37)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "一口井"
亚设家族的一员 (代上7:37)
